Posts.Content: I am having CMF chemo, and having trouble eating because everything tastes funny. I know this isn"t a major problem, but I am trying hard to keep my nutrition good. Has anybody any suggestions, please? Thank you.
Posts.Title: Metallic taste

Posts.Content: Thank you for your post about metallic tastes. Good luck with your treatment, when do you start? I am having 12 treatments in all - 4 Epirubicin, & 8 CMF. Are you the same? Hope all is going well, Ann
Posts.Title: Metallic taste
